tn.esprit.querybuilder.interfaces

Interface QueriesFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueriesFactoryImpl

    public interface QueriesFactory
    Factory interface to create query-builder objects such as fields and queries. Concretely implemented by a class for each database.
    Author:
    Dhia

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Field newAllField()
      Creates an all fields selector.
      Field newAllField(java.lang.String table)
      Creates an all fields selector for the specified table.
      Field newAvg(Field field, java.lang.String alias)
      Creates an average aggregate function on the specified field.
      Field newCount(Field field, java.lang.String alias)
      Creates a count aggregate function on the specified field.
      Field newCustomField(java.lang.String custom)
      Creates a custom field.
      DeleteQuery newDeleteQuery()
      Creates a DELETE query.
      InsertQuery newInsertQuery()
      Creates an INSERT query.
      Field newMax(Field field, java.lang.String alias)
      Creates a count aggregate function on the specified field.
      Field newMin(Field field, java.lang.String alias)
      Creates a minimum function on the specified field.
      Field newQualifiedField(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a qualified database field.
      Query newQuery(java.lang.String sql)
      Creates a query object with the given sql.
      SelectQuery newSelectQuery()
      Creates a SELECT query.
      Field newStdField(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a standard database field.
      Field newSum(Field field, java.lang.String alias)
      Creates a SUM aggregate function on the specified field.
      UpdateQuery newUpdateQuery()
      Creates an UPDATE query.

    • Method Detail

      • newAllField

        Field newAllField()
        Creates an all fields selector.
        Returns:
        Field

      • newAllField

        Field newAllField(java.lang.String table)
        Creates an all fields selector for the specified table.
        Parameters:
        table - - A table name without backticks.
        Returns:
        Field

      • newStdField

        Field newStdField(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a standard database field. Will enclose the field in backticks in the final query.
        Parameters:
        name - - A table column without backticks.
        Returns:
        Field

      • newQualifiedField

        Field newQualifiedField(java.lang.String table,
                        java.lang.String name)
        Creates a qualified database field. Will enclose the field and table name in backticks in the final query.
        Parameters:
        table - - A table name without backticks.
        name - - A table column without backticks.
        Returns:
        Field

      • newSum

        Field newSum(Field field,
             java.lang.String alias)
        Creates a SUM aggregate function on the specified field.
        Parameters:
        field - - Returned by newStdField.
        alias - - A string to use with AS. May be null in which case no AS is used.
        Returns:
        Field

      • newCount

        Field newCount(Field field,
               java.lang.String alias)
        Creates a count aggregate function on the specified field.
        Parameters:
        field - - Returned by newStdField.
        alias - - A string to use with AS. May be null in which case no AS is used.
        Returns:
        Field

      • newQuery

        Query newQuery(java.lang.String sql)
        Creates a query object with the given sql. Only use this if the query builder can not build an appropriate query.
        Parameters:
        sql - - A custom sql string.
        Returns:
        Query
